TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Cyprus, title = Cyprus, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyprus} }

S.FORM: Cyprus u Cyprus sa ilabu nu Yaco, itiza i 35 00 N, 33 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 9,251 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 9,241 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 10 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 1,205,575. kakalukan umah sa 13.40%, kilakilangan umah sa 18.80%, zumaay henay umah sa 67.80% tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Nicosia . sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 1 bulad 10 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Nicos Anastasiades, micakat a demiad sa i 2013 a mihca 2 bulad 28 demiad. u hata nu Cyprus u kulit nu hata nu Cyprus sa, situlu ku kulit. Cyprus mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal (Greece a kamu : Κυπριακή Δημοκρατία；Turkey a kamu :Kıbrıs Cumhuriyeti)u ngangan tu Cyprus (kamu nu Greece , Κύπρος；kamu nu Turkey : Kıbrıs), i tini i Asiaan atu European tu cacaliwaay tu Mediterranean nuwalian a cacay subal akanatal, u ahebal 9,251 km2. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: :Kıbrıs Cumhuriyeti),通稱賽普勒斯(希臘語:Κύπρος；土耳其語:Kıbrıs), .) matinengay u tademaw i Cyprus mauzep nzipaan saayaw taneng a micilim, katukuh i ayaw nu celacan tu 10,000 a mihcaan, itawya a ziday a nadipaan izaw ku Choirokoitia (Ciyaw-i-lu-ke-di-ya, 喬伊魯科蒂亞), u baluhay ba'tuay a ziday masupet tu tukuhay ayza kapah henay ku saluyaluy ku nipatizengay nisangaay, Cyprus zayhan nakakitizaan Mediterranean micumut tu nutipan u Asia a kakitizaan amacebus , namakay sumamadan katukuh ayza u Hittite (Si-tay, 西臺), Assyria (Ya-su', 亞述), Egypt , Persia (Po-se, 波斯), A-la-po-ha-li-ba-uang-caw , U-may-ye-wang-caw Venice atu Turkey Ottoman ti-kuo nu cumudan atu alaen nu icelangay nu tayniay. ayaw nu celacan tu 333 a mihcaan, Alexander tabakiay a hung-ti namakay Persia (Po-se, 波斯) a tademaw na i lima milayap mikuwan tunian a subal, 1878 a mihcaan malingatu u UK ku mikuwanay, katukuh i 1960 a mihcaan pakalatu tu misateket, tucila a mihcaan mala u tabakiay a UK kanatal nu mapulungay a kanatal , Cyprus namisakeket hawsa u angangaan u binacadan Greece a tadenmaw atu cayay kakatuud nu binacadan Turkey a tademaw haymaw satu makacukah a malasawat, katukuh i 1974 a mihcaan, mapuwah pihaceng satu kunicacukah maizang tuni kawaw nu banacadan, angangan mueneng tunian a subal, nuwamisan nu Turkey a tademaw, micalap atu micukep tu i tiniay izaw kuni zuma a patizeng tu sapikuwan tu nuwamisanay a Cyprus atu Turkey mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal . ayaw i 58 a mihcaan linga'tu, Roma ti-kuo itini patizeng tu Cyprus a kanatal, palalit tu 400 a mihcaan, 395 a mihcaan u ni Byzantine a kanatal, 1489 a mihcaan Venice mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal mataemut, 1571 a mihcaan nu Turkey Ottoman ti-kuo pakaseneng tuway, 1573 a mihcaan makakelac.1878 a mihcaan nu UK a kamatal pakaseneng tu Cyprus, u UK malinga'tu tu Cyprus makala tu 82 a mihcaan a mikuwan. 1925 a mihcaan namakay UK u kakitizaan nu midebengay. Greece a sulit "Κυπριακή Δημοκρατία" La-ding a sulit tuni kaniyulan a sulit "Kypriakí Demokratía", ngangan"Κύπρος", Turkey sulit "Kıbrıs Cumhuriyeti", ngangan "Kıbrıs" han, China Ta-lu a kanatal u imi u Cyprus mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal i cen-ce a nizatengan atu nuamisan Cyprus masasuayaw,nutimulan Cyprus . (u kamu nu Hulam sa: :"Kypriakí Demokratía"),簡稱"Κύπρος"；土耳其文為"Kıbrıs Cumhuriyeti",簡稱"Kıbrıs", Cyprus mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal .) laylay kasumamadan ayaw nu 8,000 a mihcaan, izaw tu ku mananelay tu i tiniay a nuyazu', ayaw nu 16 a mihcaan, Greece a tademaw mabelaw nueneng. Cyprus a subal i kasasumamadan pasu Assyria ti-ku a ziday pangangan han nu Jewish (Yu-tay, 猶太) a tademaw tu Kitty a subal ( 基提島, Kittim,כתים), ayaw nu 709 a mihcaan ayaw nu 525 a mihcaan a laed, kakilul mademec Assyria (Ya-su, 亞述) Egypt atu Persia a tademaw. ayaw i 58 a mihcaan linga'tu, Roma ti-kuo itini patizeng tu Cyprus a kanatal, palalit tu 400 a mihcaan, 395 a mihcaan u ni Byzantine a kanatal, 1489 a mihcaan Venice mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal mataemut, 1571 a mihcaan nu Turkey Ottoman ti-kuo pakaseneng tuway, 1573 a mihcaan makakelac.1878 a mihcaan nu UK a kamatal pakaseneng tu Cyprus , u UK malinga'tu tu Cyprus makala tu 82 a mihcaan a mikuwan. 1925 a mihcaan namakay UK u kakitizaan nu midebengay. Cyprus imahini malaliyas tusa ku sakuwan Cyprus , nutumulan a Greece a tademaw kupikuwan, atu Cyprus mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal (kamu nu Greece: Κυπριακή Δημοκρατία), pakala tu ni palatatenga nu kitakit a sayhuay, masakaputay a kanatal a tademaw atu EU masakaputay a kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) nuamisan Cyprus Tu-rl-si mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal , nuwamisanay a Turkey a tademaw mikuwan, atu nuamisan Cyprus Tu-rl-si mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal , adidi' ku nikala' tu Turkey atu sakaku sa musakamu amisateleday a Azerbaijan (Ya-se-pay-dang 亞塞拜然) tu Naxçıvan (Na-si-cia-wan 納希切萬) misakaku tu palatatenga imahini u Turkey a tademaw malaheci kunipikelac. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) sakawaw tu kenis kakitizaan行政區劃 Cyprus a macu'賽普勒斯地圖 Cyprus pulung malaliyas sepat ku sacaay ka lecat ku kawawan a kenis, Cyprus mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal pasu pikuwan tu lala' u uyni a nganganan tungusay nu Cyprus mapulungnay masakaputay a kanatal , tatengaay nuyaan nu nuwamisan a Cyprus mapulungnay Turkey masakaputay a kanatal uni u pikelec tu kenis , u UN pacena' mikuwan atu misakaku amikuwan, i tini i UK a lima'an u adidi'ay a kasiwasak nu kakitizaan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: ) hekal a lala'地理 Cyprus i tini i Asia a satipan, nu Mediterranean sawalian a supal nu kanatal, Cyprus a subal i tini i Mediterranean u saka tulu tabakiay a subal, sakacacay i Sicily a subal atu Sardinia a subal, u dadipasan katanayu' 537 malebut a min, nuwamisan tanayu' licecu' ku buyu', yadah ku apuyu'ay a buyu',satipan nutimulan u buyu', masatalakaw ku lala', tepanay u May-su-li-ya a enelay, subalay a sawuwac mahicatu uyza dada' caay ka yadah ku macelahay a sauwac, tungusay u tanengay a akuti' nu Mediterranean a demiad, lalut akuti' makelad, palalecad tu akuti' 28－35℃, kasienawan tatutung ku kasienaw masumed u akuti'4－10℃. u Cyprus nu kasumamadan nu malukay a kanatal, satu a palahat tu papiitangay a kawaw, u kakitaan tu ku binawlan, u palalecat nu tademaw i kanatal nilaculan pulung nu aca katalakawan ku nu EU malecat ku ni u tinsu. 2013 a mihcaan, malawlaw nu tadah Cyprus a cenbu maala' ku EUR nidapan paketun pasayza i ing-hang misuput i ging-ku misuput tu kalisiw miala tu siputan tu sugiti', palekal tu tizaay a mapingkuay a ging-ku. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 2013年, .) tademaw 2003 a mihcaan a tademaw pakala tu 80 a mang, Greece a iluc Cyprus a tademaw pakala tu 85.2％, Cyprus a iluc pakala tu 11.6％, namakay 2000 a mihcaan a linga'tu, katuud ku nu zumaay a kanatal misakakawaway a kuli' namakay Philippines , Thailand , Sri Lanka tayni musakakawaw. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 2003年, .) mamilatlatay Pavlos Kontides (Pa-bu-lu-se-kang-ti-de-se 帕夫洛斯·康蒂德斯) i 2012 a mihcaan tu lalud i Olympic ( Aw-ling-pi-ke 奧林匹克) a kadupaan payapay a balunga madatemec tu adidi'ay a pabesut a balunga u kakademec pakala tu ging a paya' u Cyprus u saayaway a Olympics a kawlah a paya', u Uang-ciw miwatawatay a tademaw ci Baghdatis (Pa-ce-ta-ti-se 巴格達蒂斯) u Cyprus aca a tademaw. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA 外交部

Cypros o Cypros sa ilabo no Yaco, itiza i 35 00 N, 33 00 E. o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 9,251 km2. o ahebal no lala'ay sa 9,241 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 10 km2. hamin no tademaw sa 1,205,575. kakalokan omah sa 13.40%, kilakilangan omah sa 18.80%, zomaay henay omah sa 67.80% tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Nicosia . sapadateng no kanatal demiad sapadateng no kanatal demiad sa 1 bolad 10 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Nicos Anastasiades, micakat a demiad sa i 2013 a mihca 2 bolad 28 demiad. o hata no Cypros o kolit no hata no Cypros sa, sitolo ko kolit. Cypros mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal (Greece a kamo : Κυπριακή Δημοκρατία；Torkey a kamo :Kıbrıs Comhoriyeti)o ngangan to Cypros (kamo no Greece , Κύπρος；kamo no Torkey : Kıbrıs), i tini i Asiaan ato Eoropean to cacaliwaay to Mediterranean nowalian a cacay sobal akanatal, o ahebal 9,251 km2. (o kamo no Holam sa: :Kıbrıs Comhoriyeti),通稱賽普勒斯(希臘語:Κύπρος；土耳其語:Kıbrıs), .) matinengay o tademaw i Cypros maozep nzipaan saayaw taneng a micilim, katokoh i ayaw no celacan to 10,000 a mihcaan, itawya a ziday a nadipaan izaw ko Choirokoitia (Ciyaw-i-lo-ke-di-ya, 喬伊魯科蒂亞), o balohay ba'toay a ziday masopet to tokohay ayza kapah henay ko saloyaloy ko nipatizengay nisangaay, Cypros zayhan nakakitizaan Mediterranean micomot to notipan o Asia a kakitizaan amacebos , namakay somamadan katokoh ayza o Hittite (Si-tay, 西臺), Assyria (Ya-so', 亞述), Egypt , Persia (Po-se, 波斯), A-la-po-ha-li-ba-oang-caw , U-may-ye-wang-caw Venice ato Torkey Ottoman ti-koo no comodan ato alaen no icelangay no tayniay. ayaw no celacan to 333 a mihcaan, Alexander tabakiay a hong-ti namakay Persia (Po-se, 波斯) a tademaw na i lima milayap mikowan tonian a sobal, 1878 a mihcaan malingato o UK ko mikowanay, katokoh i 1960 a mihcaan pakalato to misateket, tocila a mihcaan mala o tabakiay a UK kanatal no mapolongay a kanatal , Cypros namisakeket hawsa o angangaan o binacadan Greece a tadenmaw ato cayay kakatood no binacadan Torkey a tademaw haymaw sato makacokah a malasawat, katokoh i 1974 a mihcaan, mapowah pihaceng sato konicacokah maizang toni kawaw no banacadan, angangan moeneng tonian a sobal, nowamisan no Torkey a tademaw, micalap ato micokep to i tiniay izaw koni zoma a patizeng to sapikowan to nowamisanay a Cypros ato Torkey mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal . ayaw i 58 a mihcaan linga'to, Roma ti-koo itini patizeng to Cypros a kanatal, palalit to 400 a mihcaan, 395 a mihcaan o ni Byzantine a kanatal, 1489 a mihcaan Venice mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal mataemot, 1571 a mihcaan no Torkey Ottoman ti-koo pakaseneng toway, 1573 a mihcaan makakelac.1878 a mihcaan no UK a kamatal pakaseneng to Cypros, o UK malinga'to to Cypros makala to 82 a mihcaan a mikowan. 1925 a mihcaan namakay UK o kakitizaan no midebengay. Greece a solit "Κυπριακή Δημοκρατία" La-ding a solit toni kaniyolan a solit "Kypriakí Demokratía", ngangan"Κύπρος", Torkey solit "Kıbrıs Comhoriyeti", ngangan "Kıbrıs" han, China Ta-lo a kanatal o imi o Cypros mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal i cen-ce a nizatengan ato noamisan Cypros masasoayaw,notimolan Cypros . (o kamo no Holam sa: :"Kypriakí Demokratía"),簡稱"Κύπρος"；土耳其文為"Kıbrıs Comhoriyeti",簡稱"Kıbrıs", Cypros mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal .) laylay kasomamadan ayaw no 8,000 a mihcaan, izaw to ko mananelay to i tiniay a noyazo', ayaw no 16 a mihcaan, Greece a tademaw mabelaw noeneng. Cypros a sobal i kasasomamadan paso Assyria ti-ko a ziday pangangan han no Jewish (Yo-tay, 猶太) a tademaw to Kitty a sobal ( 基提島, Kittim,כתים), ayaw no 709 a mihcaan ayaw no 525 a mihcaan a laed, kakilol mademec Assyria (Ya-so, 亞述) Egypt ato Persia a tademaw. ayaw i 58 a mihcaan linga'to, Roma ti-koo itini patizeng to Cypros a kanatal, palalit to 400 a mihcaan, 395 a mihcaan o ni Byzantine a kanatal, 1489 a mihcaan Venice mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal mataemot, 1571 a mihcaan no Torkey Ottoman ti-koo pakaseneng toway, 1573 a mihcaan makakelac.1878 a mihcaan no UK a kamatal pakaseneng to Cypros , o UK malinga'to to Cypros makala to 82 a mihcaan a mikowan. 1925 a mihcaan namakay UK o kakitizaan no midebengay. Cypros imahini malaliyas tosa ko sakowan Cypros , notomolan a Greece a tademaw kopikowan, ato Cypros mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal (kamo no Greece: Κυπριακή Δημοκρατία), pakala to ni palatatenga no kitakit a sayhoay, masakapotay a kanatal a tademaw ato EU masakapotay a kanatal. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) noamisan Cypros To-rl-si mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal , nowamisanay a Torkey a tademaw mikowan, ato noamisan Cypros To-rl-si mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal , adidi' ko nikala' to Torkey ato sakako sa mosakamo amisateleday a Azerbaijan (Ya-se-pay-dang 亞塞拜然) to Naxçıvan (Na-si-cia-wan 納希切萬) misakako to palatatenga imahini o Torkey a tademaw malaheci konipikelac. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) sakawaw to kenis kakitizaan行政區劃 Cypros a maco'賽普勒斯地圖 Cypros polong malaliyas sepat ko sacaay ka lecat ko kawawan a kenis, Cypros mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal paso pikowan to lala' o oyni a nganganan tongosay no Cypros mapolongnay masakapotay a kanatal , tatengaay noyaan no nowamisan a Cypros mapolongnay Torkey masakapotay a kanatal oni o pikelec to kenis , o UN pacena' mikowan ato misakako amikowan, i tini i UK a lima'an o adidi'ay a kasiwasak no kakitizaan. (o kamo no Holam sa: ) hekal a lala'地理 Cypros i tini i Asia a satipan, no Mediterranean sawalian a sopal no kanatal, Cypros a sobal i tini i Mediterranean o saka tolo tabakiay a sobal, sakacacay i Sicily a sobal ato Sardinia a sobal, o dadipasan katanayo' 537 malebot a min, nowamisan tanayo' liceco' ko boyo', yadah ko apoyo'ay a boyo',satipan notimolan o boyo', masatalakaw ko lala', tepanay o May-so-li-ya a enelay, sobalay a sawowac mahicato oyza dada' caay ka yadah ko macelahay a saowac, tongosay o tanengay a akoti' no Mediterranean a demiad, lalot akoti' makelad, palalecad to akoti' 28－35℃, kasienawan tatotong ko kasienaw masomed o akoti'4－10℃. o Cypros no kasomamadan no malokay a kanatal, sato a palahat to papiitangay a kawaw, o kakitaan to ko binawlan, o palalecat no tademaw i kanatal nilacolan polong no aca katalakawan ko no EU malecat ko ni o tinso. 2013 a mihcaan, malawlaw no tadah Cypros a cenbo maala' ko EUR nidapan paketon pasayza i ing-hang misopot i ging-ko misopot to kalisiw miala to sipotan to sogiti', palekal to tizaay a mapingkoay a ging-ko. (o kamo no Holam sa: 2013年, .) tademaw 2003 a mihcaan a tademaw pakala to 80 a mang, Greece a iloc Cypros a tademaw pakala to 85.2％, Cypros a iloc pakala to 11.6％, namakay 2000 a mihcaan a linga'to, katood ko no zomaay a kanatal misakakawaway a koli' namakay Philippines , Thailand , Sri Lanka tayni mosakakawaw. (o kamo no Holam sa: 2003年, .) mamilatlatay Pavlos Kontides (Pa-bo-lo-se-kang-ti-de-se 帕夫洛斯·康蒂德斯) i 2012 a mihcaan to lalod i Olympic ( Aw-ling-pi-ke 奧林匹克) a kadopaan payapay a balonga madatemec to adidi'ay a pabesot a balonga o kakademec pakala to ging a paya' o Cypros o saayaway a Olympics a kawlah a paya', o Uang-ciw miwatawatay a tademaw ci Baghdatis (Pa-ce-ta-ti-se 巴格達蒂斯) o Cypros aca a tademaw. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan CIA 外交部
